ygData.subject: Re: Wizard Spell
ygData.msgSnippet: It s not only elves that are killed by that merchant.  It s anyone of any race who is pledged to Tunare as goddess.  The clockwork merchant is somehow offended
ygData.messageBody:
It's not only elves that are killed by that merchant. It's anyone of any
race who is pledged to Tunare as goddess. The clockwork merchant is somehow
offended by this "vile religion."

----- Original Message -----
From: mstokes <mstokes@...>
To: <eq_wizards@onelist.com>
Sent: Thursday, April 22, 1999 1:17 PM
Subject: [eq_wizards] Re: Wizard Spell


> From: mstokes <mstokes@...>
>
> Ak'anon has quite a selection of spells. Class specific spells can be
> found in the outside edge rooms, and common spells are sold by the
> merchants in the center. Warning: Elves are sometimes killed by a
merchant
> when they zone into the city.
>
> Malkin of Fennin Ro
>
>
> Billy Sun wrote:
>
> > From: "Billy Sun" <bsun@...>
> >
> > In which town beside Freeport, I can aquire Wizard Spell? Thanks.
> >
